remarks: Closure of the column replacement function for square matrices. (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 26-Feb-2019.)
statement:
marepvcl.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
marepvcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
marepvcl.v $e |- V = ( ( Base ` R ) ^m N ) $.
marepvcl $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( M e. B /\ C e. V /\ K e. N ) ) -> ( ( M ( N matRepV R ) C ) ` K ) e. B ) $.
